statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE dest_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND payload_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM network_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router' AND mac_address = '00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp < '2021-07-01' AND protocol = 'HTTP';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' AND source_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM network_analysis WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE device_id = 5 AND traffic_bytes > 1000;
